original_text: So David and his men went on the road, while Shimei went along on the hillside opposite him and cursed as he went and threw stones at him and flung dust.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 추종자들이 길을 갈 때에 시므이는 산비탈로 따라가면서 저주하고 그를 향하여 돌을 던지며 먼지를 날리더라

sentences.original_text: So David and his men went on the road
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 다윗과 그의 사람들은 길을 따라 갔습니다

sentences.original_text: while Shimei went along on the hillside opposite him
sentences.korean_translation: 한편 시므이는 그와 맞은편 언덕길을 따라 걸으면서
